Presentacion.Descripcion: Definitely, the best option for the job is John Brown, but he will have to adapt to the schedules at the office. Help me organize his routine activities in a logical order. Drag the activities to the blank spaces.

Retroalimentacion.Bien: Excellent! You can now identify the main actions of Johnâ€™s routine. Is yours similar?
Retroalimentacion.Mal: Try again! Think about your own routine. It must not be too different from yours.
